# URL

**Type Property**

URL data for one file or resource.

## Declaration

```swift
static let URL: NSPasteboard.PasteboardType
```

## Discussion

In macOS 10.6 and later, use [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPasteboard/writeObjects(_:)] to write URLs directly to the pasteboard instead.

In macOS 10.5 and earlier, write an URL to a pasteboard using the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSURL/write(to:)] method of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSURL]. To get an URL from a pasteboard, use the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSURL/init(fromPasteboard:)] method of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSURL].

## Pasteboard Types

- **collaborationMetadata**: An object you use for conveying data during a collaboration.
- **color**: Color data.
- **fileContents**: A representation of a file’s contents.
- **fileURL**: A file URL.
- **findPanelSearchOptions**: Type for the find panel metadata property list.
- **font**: Font and character information.
- **html**: Type for HTML content.
- **multipleTextSelection**: Multiple text selection.
- **pdf**: PDF data.
- **png**: PNG image data.
- **rtf**: Rich Text Format (RTF) data.
- **rtfd**: RTFD formatted file contents.
- **ruler**: Paragraph formatting information.
- **sound**: Sound data.
- **string**: String data.
